00039         class DllExport TextureManager
00040         {
00041         public:
00044                 enum TexturesID
00045                 {
00046                         // Normal map
00047                         TEX_NORMAL_ID = 0
00048                 };
00049 
00053                 TextureManager(Hydrax* h);
00054 
00057                 ~TextureManager();
00058 
00062                 void create(const Size &Size);
00063 
00066                 void remove();
00067 
00076                 inline bool update(const TexturesID &Id, Image &Image)
00077                 {
00078             if (Id == TEX_NORMAL_ID)
00079                         {
00080                                 return _updateNormalMap(Image);
00081                         }
00082 
00083                         return false;
00084                 }
00085 
00090                 inline Ogre::TexturePtr& getTexture(const TexturesID &Id)
00091                 {
00092                         return mTextures[static_cast<int>(Id)];
00093                 }
00094 
00099                 inline const Ogre::String& getTextureName(const TexturesID &Id) const
00100                 {
00101                         return mTextureNames[static_cast<int>(Id)];
00102                 }
00103 
00104         private:
00111                 bool _createTexture(Ogre::TexturePtr &Texture, const Ogre::String &Name, const Size &Size);
00112 
00117                 Ogre::TexturePtr _getTexture(const Ogre::String &Name);
00118 
00124         bool _updateNormalMap(Image &Image);
00125 
00127         Ogre::TexturePtr mTextures[1];
00129                 Ogre::String mTextureNames[1];
00130 
00132         bool mCreated;
00133 
00135                 Hydrax *mHydrax;
00136         };
